title: Saas Dashboard
challenge: Enterprise users often struggle with sluggish data visualization tools that fail to handle complex state, leading to decision-making bottlenecks.
approach: Developed a custom state-management architecture using React Query and advanced memoization. Integrated real-time data streaming with optimized rendering cycles to ensure zero-lag interactions even during heavy data bursts.
outcome: Successfully deployed a high-performance analytics suite that processes over 10k data points per second without UI blocking.

title: Saas Landing
challenge: Generic landing pages suffered from high bounce rates (70%+) due to slow mobile load times and fractured user journeys.
approach: Engineered an SEO-centric architecture with Next.js ISR (Incremental Static Regeneration). Implemented high-impact micro-interactions using Framer Motion to increase session duration and guide user focus toward CTA conversion points.
outcome: Achieved a premium, apple-esque user experience that significantly boosted brand trust and lead generation.

title: AI Landing Page
challenge: AI startups struggle to explain complex value propositions to non-technical users, leading to low signup rates and high marketing costs.
approach: Designed a visual-storytelling interface with interactive AI feature simulations. Built a seamless waitlist system with serverless backend integrations to handle viral traffic spikes without downtime.
outcome: Created a high-converting onboarding flow that captured thousands of qualified leads within the first week of launch.

title: Photography Banner
challenge: High-resolution portfolios often fail to pass Googleâ€™s Core Web Vitals, negatively impacting SEO and user perception of professional quality.
approach: Implemented a custom image-optimization pipeline using Next/Image and Sharp. Developed 'blur-up' placeholders and layout shift prevention techniques to maintain a perfect 0 CLS score while delivering pixel-perfect visuals.
outcome: Delivered a lightning-fast experience that ranks in the top 1% of creative portfolios globally for performance.

title: Katachi Studio
challenge: Creative agencies require non-traditional, highly dynamic layouts that often fight against standard CSS frameworks, resulting in bloated codebases.
approach: Architected a custom 'Bento-Grid' design system from scratch. Optimized SVG animations and asset delivery to maintain extreme performance while offering a highly sophisticated, interactive brand experience.
outcome: Reduced bounce rates by half and significantly increased the average time spent on site for prospective clients.
